id.title: Weapon ID
id.description: Numerical identifier for this weapon, unique across the entire game

name.title: Weapon Name
name.description: A name for the weapon, intended to be used as a recognizable ID. This is often the same as an associated item, but doesn't have to be.

damage.title: Base Weapon Damage
damage.description: Amount of damage the weapon inflicts on an enemy with no weakness or resistance to it

useRequires.title: Weapon Use Requirements
useRequires.description: Equipment, tech, and flag requirements that are needed to be able to use this weapon

items.title: Elements are assumed to be ANDed together, unless this array has a key of 'or'

shotRequires.title: Weapon Shot Requirements
shotRequires.description: Additional Equipment, tech, and flag requirements that are needed, on top of the use requirements, for every shot fired with this weapon.

items.title: Elements are assumed to be ANDed together, unless this array has a key of 'or'

situational.title: Situational
situational.description: If true, this weapon's usability depends on situational things, such as room layout. If false, this weapon is always usable when its requirements are met.

categories.title: Weapon Categories
categories.description: An array of categories that apply to this weapon. Useful for grouping weapons together in an enemy's weaknesses or invulnerabilities
